3: Climbing onto the wall with her appendages, Bazhi checks the next waypoint. Valeria soon follows.
I caught our rat's signal. This should be the right way.
Valeria reaches for her back subconsciously.
This is a virtual space inside Gestalt. Your anti-materiel rifle isn't a data weapon.
And the data weapons we have here won't do from this range. Give up.
It's a long trek to the next waypoint. You'll never get there at your pace, need a ride?
